headline: Jim Cramer on Home Depot: “Worst Acting Stock in the Charitable Trust”
summary: The Home Depot, Inc. (NYSE:HD) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer recently discussed. Cramer highlighted the stock’s performance during the episode, as he said: “Perhaps the worst acting stock in the Charitable Trust of late is Home Depot. It’s been straight down like it’s wearing cement galoshes, about to get swimming in the Mississippi. […]
